en.answer:
Yes, you can.

(TL note: The Japanese term used, 取り除く, literally translates to "remove". The TCG translates this as "detach". We intentionally preserve the literal translation above.)
en.question: An Xyz Material is returned to the hand, Deck, or Extra Deck, such as by the effects of Materiactor Gigaboros or Exosisters Magnifica, or is banished, such as by the effect of Sacrifice Level-Up. Can I now activate the effects of Gigantic "Champion" Sargas or Goblin Biker Big Gabonga, which can be activated if material is removed from a monster on the field?
en.title: If an Xyz Material returns to the hand, Deck, or Extra Deck, or is banished, is this considered to be material being removed from a monster?

ja.question: エクシーズ素材のカードが、「<<17254>>」「<<15957>>」「<<17157>>」の効果によって手札・エクストラデッキに戻った場合や、「<<19748>>」の効果で除外された場合、「<<18190>>」や「<<19502>>」の『フィールドのX素材が取り除かれた場合』の効果を発動できますか？
ja.title: エクシーズ素材のカードが手札・エクストラデッキに戻った場合や除外された場合、『フィールドのX素材が取り除かれた場合』の効果を発動できますか？
